sentences.english: I barely have time to sit down.
sentences.chinese: 我几乎连坐的时间都没有。

sentences.english: She would sit there for hours sometimes , doing nothing at all .
sentences.chinese: 他有时一连坐好几个小时，什么事情也不干。

sentences.english: Local authorities require the family of the condemned, including young children, to stand in the front row of spectators.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府要求其家庭连坐，包括儿童都要游街。

sentences.english: What followed was a classic example of collective punishment.
sentences.chinese: 随之而来的便是一个连坐的经典例子。

sentences.english: The baby can't even sit up yet, let alone walk!
sentences.chinese: 这个婴儿连坐都坐不稳，更不用说走路了。

sentences.english: Why do you have ants in your pants today? you can't sit still for one second.
sentences.chinese: 你为什么今天坐立不安呢？你连坐一秒钟都不行。

sentences.english: B: I’m really busy. I barely have time to sit down.
sentences.chinese: 我太忙了，几乎连坐一下的时间都没有。
